title: Arturia Spark Dubstep v1.7.2-R2R [deepstatus]
description:
Arturia Spark Dubstep v1.7.2





Create cool and hip beats with the Arturia Spark Dubstep virtual drum machine software. Sculpt and design awesome Dubstep beats with this powerful and great-sounding program. You get access to 30 different drum kits and 480 instruments. High-quality effects like reverb, chorus, distortion, and more let you put the icing on your beats for that professional sound. Tons of MIDI patterns let you quickly create killer beats. Bring your Dubstep dreams to reality with the flexible and powerful Arturia Spark Dubstep virtual drum machine software.



        Arturia Spark Dubstep Virtual Drum Machine Software at a Glance:

   Easy to program
   Top-shelf effects
   Use Spark Dubstep live


Easy to program
Spark Dubstep virtual drum machine is extremely simple to use. With expandable patterns and a 16-step sequencer inspired by Roland's original TR-series, programming tracks in Arturia's Spark Dubstep virtual drum machine is a cinch. Whether you use Spark Dubstep as a plug-in or in standalone mode, you get all the same functionality and great sounds.

Top-shelf effects
Arturia's Spark Dubstep virtual drum machine includes 14 high-quality effects, including a multiband compressor, reverb, bit crusher, multiband EQ, chorus, delay, distortion, phaser, plate reverb, destroyer, flanger, space pan, limiter, and sub generator. Use these effects to totally change your sound or for subtle embellishments.

Use Spark Dubstep live
While Spark Dubstep is perfect for the studio, it's also great for live performances. You get an intuitive XY Pad that gives you real-time slicing and filtering, so you can to effortlessly create awesome breaks. You also get three types of filters (lowpass, highpass, and band pass), plus an advanced looper, that lets you divide loop size and move looping position simultaneously! Use this cool feature for introducing stutter dynamics into your music. Combine it with the XY Pad to send your audience off into another dimension.





          Arturia Spark Dubstep Virtual Drum Machine Software Features:

   Create Dubstep beats with 30 drum kits and 480 instruments
   High-quality effects such as reverb, flanger, phaser, distortion, and more
   Great to studio and live performance
   16 independent audio outputs
   Easy and intuitive programing
   Mac/PC, RTAS, VST




                          Specification

Standalone Virtual Instrument
Supported Computer Format PC
Supported Plug-In Formats PC, RTAS, VST
Hardware Requirements - PC 2 GHz CPU, 2 GB RAM, 2GB free hard disk space
OS Requirements - PC Windows XP/Vista/7




                          INSTALLATION:


       UnRaR.

Kawa-eLicenser v1.0.1

1.Kawa-eLicenser_Install.exe
 The installer of our emulator (x86/x64).
 Just run and install.

2.Kawa-eLicenser_Patch.exe
 This patch makes apps to load our emu instead of the official one.
 Generally *.exe, *.dll, *.vst3, *.dpm should be patched.


Arturia.Spark.Dubstep.v1.7-R2R

1.Install the software with setup.exe.
2.Copy Library dir to your HDD.
3.Run our Libary Placer included in Libary dir.

Files are patched only to load our emulator.


Arturia.Spark.Dubstep.v1.7.2-R2R

Install

[Library Fix]
The Library of Spark Dubstep 170 has file name problem.

Please rename :

riseup cy_.wav -> riseup cy,.wav
